author: rwesten
msg: STANBOL-251: Applied the changes to the new artefact IDs also in the launchers and the Taxonomylinking engine. Also updated references in out dated and no longer used components (such as the enhancer/generic/standalone stuff).
Also upgraded to commons-codec version 1.5 because Clerezza requires now this newer version. Hopefully this fixes the build.

author: hwright
msg: release.py: Use the Version class instead of a separate helper function.
* tools/dist/release.py
(Version): loosen the regex, add a couple of helper functions.
(split_version): Remove.
(build_env, roll_tarballs, post_candidates, write_news, write_announcement):
Use the Version class.
(main): Automatically convern incoming version strings to Version objects.

author: blair
msg: Revert part of r1145716 that has one spelling fix mistake.  No telling
why my emacs doesn't like "afterwords".
Found by: jcorvel
* subversion/include/svn_repos.h:
s/afterwords/afterwards/.

author: hwright
msg: Revert r1145771: it contained a bunch of non-intended modifications.

author: hwright
msg: [ This revision had a number of unintended modifications, so I just reverted
it all.  I re-applied it in r1145774. ]
